principles: Fun over Professionalism: It's a game, not a bank.
Pixel Perfect: Sharp edges, no blur, hard shadows.
Neon & Dark: High contrast, glowing text against void black.
Feedback Loops: Every action (trade, post) feels like a 'Hit' in a game.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. OVERRIDE TAILWIND: Set 'borderRadius' to '0px' in tailwind.config.js. This is non-negotiable for the retro look.
3. CREATE THE SCANLINE COMPONENT: Create a 'ScanlineOverlay' component with the CSS provided in visual_enhancers and add it to App.js so it covers everything.
4. USE SHADCN BUT STRIP IT: Use the logic of Shadcn (Dialog, Form, etc.) but completely replace the classes with the 'components' styles defined here. No rounded corners!
5. GAMIFY EVERYTHING: Add hover sounds (if possible) or at least aggressive hover states (movement + shadow change) to all interactive elements.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button and input has a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
